metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29190 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Pion DTLS is a Go implementation of Datagram Transport Layer Security. Prior to version 2.1.4, an attacker can send packets that sends Pion DTLS into an infinite loop when processing. Version 2.1.4 contains a patch for this issue. There are currently no known workarounds available.

criterions.comment: snowflake package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
telegraf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
